resources.string: Test your knowledge of Egyptâ€™s history, culture, and geography! Answer questions to unlock fascinating facts about the land of the Pharaohs.

Select the answer from the options given. Each time you get an answer correct, you advance to the next question and your score increase by one. If you get the answer wrong,you have 3 lives and when you use them your game ends! You can return to the title screen using up or back from within the game screen, and this will also end your game.
Welcome to Egypt Explorer! Dive into the wonders of Egypt with fun and challenging questions!
